text: The 2019–20 Perth Glory FC season is the club's 23rd season since it began in 1996. The 2019–20 A-League season was postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Australia and New Zealand. It resumed on 17 July 2020. It's in the A league. Category:2019 in association football Category:Football seasons Category:2019–20 in European football
title: 2019–20 Perth Glory FC season
